overview:
## Overview

You specify one of the NSXMLDocumentContentKind constants in [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLDocument/documentContentKind] to indicate the kind of content required for document output.
rawMarkdown:
--- source: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/Foundation/document-content-types crawled: 2025-12-05T04:21:12Z --- # Document Content Types **API Collection** Define document types. ## Overview You specify one of the NSXMLDocumentContentKind constants in [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/XMLDocument/documentContentKind] to indicate the kind of content required for document output. ## Constants - **XMLDocument.ContentKind.xml**: The default type of document content type, which is XML. - **XMLDocument.ContentKind.xhtml**: The document output is XHTML. - **XMLDocument.ContentKind.html**: Outputs empty tags in HTML without a close tag, such as `
`. - **XMLDocument.ContentKind.text**: Outputs the string value of the document by extracting the string values from all text nodes. ## Constants - **Input and Output Options**: Input and output options specifically intended for `NSXMLDocument` objects. - **XMLDocument.ContentKind**: Type used to define the kind of document content.

items.description: The default type of document content type, which is XML.
